boat.full_description:
Bob Cooke bought the plans from Paul Johnson, and spent the next two and a half years building Scalloway in ferro.

He sailed Scalloway locally for a few years but by 1984 felt ready to cross the Atlantic. Over the next few months he prepared the boat for a long trip, bought a sextant, advertised for crew and left the following year.

Scalloway was wrecked on the coast of Horta on the return trip.
boat.name: Scalloway
